trans-unit.source: Represents a heading cell within a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table"></xref> control.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableHeaderCell> class represents a heading cell in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table> control.
You can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell.Text%2A> property to specify or determine the contents of the heading cell.
This class allows you to control how the contents of the heading cell are displayed.

The alignment of the contents in the heading cell is specified by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell.HorizontalAlign%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell.VerticalAlign%2A> properties.
You can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell.Wrap%2A> property to specify whether the contents of the heading cell wrap in the cell.
You can also specify how many rows or columns in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table> control are occupied by an individual heading cell.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell.RowSpan%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell.ColumnSpan%2A> properties control how may rows and columns are used, respectively.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableHeaderCell"></xref> class.
Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableHeaderCell> class.
Gets or sets the `abbr` attribute of the HTML `th` element for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableHeaderCell"></xref> control.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableHeaderCell.AbbreviatedText%2A> property is rendered as the `abbr` attribute of the HTML `th` element.
The `abbr` attribute is used by screen readers to read a shortened version of a header for each cell in the table.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableHeaderCell.AbbreviatedText%2A> property is significant for browsers that render abbreviated text in place of the content for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableHeaderCell> control.
The value of this property is stored in view state.
A string representing the abbreviated text.
The default is an empty string ("").
Applies attributes to render to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableHeaderCell"></xref> control.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableHeaderCell.AddAttributesToRender%2A> method overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AddAttributesToRender%2A> method for the base class and, in addition to calling the base method, renders the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableHeaderCell.Scope%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableHeaderCell.AbbreviatedText%2A> properties to the `scope` and `abbr` attribute of HTML `th` element, respectively.
An <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that receives the rendered content.
Gets or sets the `axis` attribute of the HTML `th` element for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableHeaderCell"></xref> control.
The categories can be any string values that are pertinent to the table.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableHeaderCell.CategoryText%2A> property is rendered as the `axis` attribute of the HTML `th` element, which is used to group table cells into conceptual categories.
The categories are rendered in HTML as a comma-delimited list.
The value of this property is stored in view state.
An array of string values representing the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableHeaderCell"></xref> categories.
Gets or sets the scope of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableHeaderCell"></xref> control when it is rendered.
Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableHeaderCell.Scope%2A> property to get or set the scope of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableHeaderCell> control when it is rendered.
The scope of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableHeaderCell> represents the cells that the header applies to.

For complex tables, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell.AssociatedHeaderCellID%2A> property, which provides more control over the specification of the relationship of header cells to data cells.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableHeaderCell.Scope%2A> property is used to make HTML tables more accessible by providing information about relationships between the cells and the headers.
For a list of the available table header scopes, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableHeaderScope>.
The value of this property is stored in view state.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableHeaderScope"></xref> value.
The default is <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableHeaderScope.NotSet"></xref>.
